title: Bugslpat because of internet?
body: I have two homes.  I am able to play league of legends perfectly in home 1 but in home 2, I always bugsplat and cannot play whatsoever.  There is nothing wrong with my laptop/game client as I can literally go to my other home to play so I assume there is a problem with my internet in home 2.  I am able to play every other game perfectly fine, however, I bugsplat when I try to play league.  I have even connected a LAN cable between my laptop and my modem, yet, I still bugsplat.  Any suggestions?

replies.body: Are you on the updated client?  If so, do you have any issues at all on the legacy client?  It's really rare the a bugsplat would occur due to a connection issue, so your issue is really strange to me.   Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look with you, and attach some logs to it via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll get back to you asap!
